I took Upstate common sense directly to the Vice President in a meeting at the White House, and we worked to find a compromise to get #USMCA to the finish line. The Constitution, the rule of law, respect for justice and individual dignity have standards and therefore must be subject to accountability. Read my full opinion here: https://www.syracuse.com/opinion/2019/12/rep-anthony-brindisi-we-must-protect-the-rule-of-law-commentary.html …
I will be voting not as Democrat or Republican but as an American who has been given this responsibility by the people I serve and the community I love.
Today I am what I have always been, a person privileged to live in the greatest democracy in history. It is with profound sadness I will vote to impeach President Trump.

President Trump is my President too. I’ve always said I would work with him to get things done, as I have demonstrated. However, I will always put Country first and stand up for what I believe in when I think he is wrong.

Congress constantly talks about bringing back and keeping good-paying American jobs. Passing the SPOONSS Act actually gets it done. Proud to secure this legislation for our community. https://twitter.com/WKTV/status/1206690612621299729 …

We fought hard to get the SPOONSS Act included in our final defense bill because it will create good-paying jobs in Oneida County, strengthen Upstate manufacturing, and ensure our military buys American. https://www.uticaod.com/news/20191211/brindisi-schumer-get-flatware-provision-in-defense-bill …

Sherrill Manufacturing and @LibertyTabletop make a world-class product and it is an honor that they will soon be in a strong position to provide flatware to the U.S. military through the SPOONSS Act.
